Needed to move to main tread

I generally dislike when people call their own stuff amazing and the finest.

Here's my plane, it tops out at around 1776 m/s and only uses 1 engine down from your 6, and only has 2 intakes, it also won't spin out if the engine dies .

It doesn't need Mechjeb for intakes, and just like yours; It isn't a spaceplane, since it doesn't go to space.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52579-Corsair-Hypersonic-Jet

It is a space plane since it can carry tanks also its proabley faster then my speed in the hands of a better pilot i see what you mean by better desine but since im new and this was my fist plane that went that fast that I made i called it amzaing i'm sorry if its not that good mind if i use your desine in my seires for a fighter Jet? also it dosent flip upside down very eazy and unlike yours it can carry up to 32 tons anyways thanks for you input Also note this is in V22

And cerrer mode sooooooo yea

Edited October 20, 2013 by DXTFantom

It's a spaceplane when it can actually go to space and stay there

Sure, as long as you include my name if you post it, you can use my plane for whatever you want mate
So would you like to see a plane that can go 2211.0m/s?

So would you like to see a plane that can go 2211.0m/s?

no, not really

It's relatively easy to fly fast up high.

Now, flying fast at sea level while trying to keep part count down and make the plane look good. That's the real challenge.

Edited October 20, 2013 by Whatshtisthis

My stance on planes:

Go FAR or go home.
Indeed I didnt need as meny stuts as i used but meh

What do you mean why FAR?

FAR= Farram Aerospace Research mod.

It is a plugin or mod that actually simulates "real" world aerodynamic forces on an aircraft, thus making them behave like a real plane or rocket not like in the current KSP where anything with an engine, or without can fly.
Hmm..... Never herd of it ...... im going to go look that up...
DXTFantom asked that this be removed but it'd affect the post count of everyone who came after, so I'll just close it
